ygData.subject: Problems with cantera 1.5.4
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I was using cantera 1.5.3 till now and was able to successfully convert chemkin format files into .cti files. After I installed 1.5.4, I am having trouble

Hi,

I was using cantera 1.5.3 till now and was able to successfully 
convert chemkin format files into .cti files. After I installed 
1.5.4, I am having trouble converting a particular mechanism file 
into the .cti file. I was able to convert it with the older version 
though.

The mechanism is a surrogate for JP8. I checked out the ck2cti.log 
for the error and I see that many species are read together as one 
specie. For example H2O and CO2 are read as H2OCO2. I have tried 
changing the order of the species and I get the same error.How do I 
rectify this?

Thanks,

Niveditha
